Interface GymCustomerDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
GymCustomerDAOImpl
public interface GymCustomerDAO
Data Access Object interface for customer-specific database operations. Handles gym browsing, slot booking, and booking management for gym customers.
Author:
team IOTA

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    bookSlot(int bookingId, int slotId, int userId, Date date)
    Records a new slot booking for a customer.
    boolean
    cancelBooking(int bookingId)
    Cancels an existing booking based on its ID.
    List<Booking>
    viewBookings(int userId)
    Retrieves all bookings made by a specific customer.
    List<GymCenter>
    viewGyms()
    Retrieves a list of all approved gym centers for customers to browse.

  • Method Details

    • viewGyms

      List<GymCenter> viewGyms()
      Retrieves a list of all approved gym centers for customers to browse.
      Returns:
      a list of approved GymCenter objects

    • bookSlot

      boolean bookSlot(int bookingId, int slotId, int userId, Date date)
      Records a new slot booking for a customer.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - unique ID for the booking
      slotId - ID of the slot being booked
      userId - ID of the customer booking the slot
      date - date of the workout session
      Returns:
      true if the booking was successfully recorded

    • viewBookings

      List<Booking> viewBookings(int userId)
      Retrieves all bookings made by a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - the customer's unique ID
      Returns:
      a list of their confirmed or cancelled bookings

    • cancelBooking

      boolean cancelBooking(int bookingId)
      Cancels an existing booking based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the unique booking ID to cancel
      Returns:
      true if the cancellation was successful
